mapper.insert: insert into vrul_grp (OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID, PAR_VRUL_GRP_ID, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_CODE, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_NAME, COMMON_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DT, VERSION, start_dt, end_dt, VRUL_GRP_DESC, VRUL_GRP_TYPE, CTLG_NAME, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{offerVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerVrulGrpCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerVrulGrpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commonRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vrulGrpDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrulGrpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctlgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update vrul_grp set PAR_VRUL_GRP_ID = #{parVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_CODE = #{offerVrulGrpCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_NAME = #{offerVrulGrpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMON_REGION_ID = #{commonRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DT = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_dt = #{startDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_dt = #{endDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VRUL_GRP_DESC = #{vrulGrpDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRUL_GRP_TYPE = #{vrulGrpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTLG_NAME = #{ctlgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID = #{offerVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID, PAR_VRUL_GRP_ID, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_CODE, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_NAME, COMMON_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DT, VERSION, start_dt, end_dt, VRUL_GRP_DESC, VRUL_GRP_TYPE, CTLG_NAME, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from vrul_grp where OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID = #{offerVrulGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select OFFER_VRUL_GRP_ID, PAR_VRUL_GRP_ID, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_CODE, OFFER_VRUL_GRP_NAME, COMMON_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DT, VERSION, start_dt, end_dt, VRUL_GRP_DESC, VRUL_GRP_TYPE, CTLG_NAME, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from vrul_grp
